column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I love everything about this place!  My mom and I came here since we were in town
column2: and we had heard so many wonderful reviews about this place.  We were super lucky to not have to wait in line when we went.  We ordered a Caramel and Vanilla Latte
column8: and Kouign Amman.  Everything was so delicious.  I miss it
column9: and I will definitely be back when I'm in town again.
